name: Let's Relax Aggresively
description:
A game by vvvultures. TOJam 2022.

Protect your beautiful thermae from invading sauna sprites! Be sure to monitor the heat as you go; too hot and it's all over! 

  • WASD / Arrows / DPAD to Move & target your attack
  • Shift / GP_East to Thwack
  • Alt / GP_North to Change Weapon
  • Ctrl / GP_West to Sprint
  • Spacebar / GP_South to Hop
  • P to Restart
  • P2: Start to Join!

Thwacking gnomes can cause others to fall in collateral! Cool the pool by stepping on the marked pads. The key to coming on top is a balance between the two.
You can play co-op with two controllers! Press Start on Player 2's controller to join.

Alternatively you can press Enter and play as both characters on your keyboard.
